concept.title: Go SDK 1.0
concept.shortdesc: The Couchbase Go SDK allows you to connect to a Couchbase cluster from Go.

conbody.p: The Couchbase Go SDK is a native Go library and uses the high-performance gocbcore to handle communicating to the cluster over Couchbaseâ€™s binary protocols.

section.title: Performing Queries
section.p: In addition to the basic operations that are available, we additional provide methods to perform queries against your data. These queries allow you to ask questions like "What beers start with A?" rather than simply "Give me the beer that is called Aaas_Frankl."
